DOC.brief_summary: This study measure effectiveness side effect LY317615 patient Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma ( sub-type Non-Hodgkins Lymphoma ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Oral LY317615 Relapsed Refractory Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphomas .
DOC.criteria: A diagnosis recurrent refractory Diffuse Bcell NonHodgkin 's lymphoma . Adequate organ function . Able swallow capsule . More 3 prior treatment disease . Serious heart problem .
